37 #include "cartesian_path_service_capability.h"
38 #include <moveit/robot_state/conversions.h>
39 #include <moveit/utils/message_checks.h>
40 #include <moveit/collision_detection/collision_tools.h>
41 #include <tf2_eigen/tf2_eigen.h>
42 #include <moveit/move_group/capability_names.h>
43 #include <moveit/planning_pipeline/planning_pipeline.h>
44 #include <moveit/robot_state/robot_state.h>
45 #include <moveit/robot_state/cartesian_interpolator.h>
46 #include <moveit_msgs/DisplayTrajectory.h>
47 #include <moveit/trajectory_processing/iterative_time_parameterization.h>
48 
49 namespace
50 {
51 bool isStateValid(const planning_scene::PlanningScene* planning_scene,
52  const kinematic_constraints::KinematicConstraintSet* constraint_set, moveit::core::RobotState* state,
53  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* group, const double* ik_solution)
54 {
55  state->setJointGroupPositions(group, ik_solution);
56  state->update();
57  return (!planning_scene || !planning_scene->isStateColliding(*state, group->getName())) &&
58  (!constraint_set || constraint_set->decide(*state).satisfied);
59 }
60 } // namespace
61 
62 namespace move_group
63 {
64 MoveGroupCartesianPathService::MoveGroupCartesianPathService()
65  : MoveGroupCapability("CartesianPathService"), display_computed_paths_(true)
66 {
67 }
68 
69 void MoveGroupCartesianPathService::initialize()
70 {
71  display_path_ = node_handle_.advertise<moveit_msgs::DisplayTrajectory>(
72  planning_pipeline::PlanningPipeline::DISPLAY_PATH_TOPIC, 10, true);
73  cartesian_path_service_ = root_node_handle_.advertiseService(CARTESIAN_PATH_SERVICE_NAME,
74  &MoveGroupCartesianPathService::computeService, this);
75 }
76 
77 bool MoveGroupCartesianPathService::computeService(moveit_msgs::GetCartesianPath::Request& req,
78  moveit_msgs::GetCartesianPath::Response& res)
79 {
80  ROS_INFO_NAMED(getName(), "Received request to compute Cartesian path");
81  context_->planning_scene_monitor_->updateFrameTransforms();
82 
83  moveit::core::RobotState start_state =
84  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO(context_->planning_scene_monitor_)->getCurrentState();
85  moveit::core::robotStateMsgToRobotState(req.start_state, start_state);
86  if (const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* jmg = start_state.getJointModelGroup(req.group_name))
87  {
88  std::string link_name = req.link_name;
89  if (link_name.empty() && !jmg->getLinkModelNames().empty())
90  link_name = jmg->getLinkModelNames().back();
91 
92  bool ok = true;
93  EigenSTL::vector_Isometry3d waypoints(req.waypoints.size());
94  const std::string& default_frame = context_->planning_scene_monitor_->getRobotModel()->getModelFrame();
95  bool no_transform = req.header.frame_id.empty() ||
96  moveit::core::Transforms::sameFrame(req.header.frame_id, default_frame) ||
97  moveit::core::Transforms::sameFrame(req.header.frame_id, link_name);
98 
99  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < req.waypoints.size(); ++i)
100  {
101  if (no_transform)
102  tf2::fromMsg(req.waypoints[i], waypoints[i]);
103  else
104  {
105  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped p;
106  p.header = req.header;
107  p.pose = req.waypoints[i];
108  if (performTransform(p, default_frame))
109  tf2::fromMsg(p.pose, waypoints[i]);
110  else
111  {
112  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(getName(), "Error encountered transforming waypoints to frame '%s'", default_frame.c_str());
113  ok = false;
114  break;
115  }
116  }
117  }
118 
119  if (ok)
120  {
121  if (req.max_step < std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon())
122  {
123  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(getName(), "Maximum step to take between consecutive configrations along Cartesian path"
124  "was not specified (this value needs to be > 0)");
125  res.error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::FAILURE;
126  }
127  else
128  {
129  if (!waypoints.empty())
130  {
131  moveit::core::GroupStateValidityCallbackFn constraint_fn;
132  std::unique_ptr<planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO> ls;
133  std::unique_ptr<kinematic_constraints::KinematicConstraintSet> kset;
134  if (req.avoid_collisions || !moveit::core::isEmpty(req.path_constraints))
135  {
136  ls = std::make_unique<planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO>(context_->planning_scene_monitor_);
137  kset = std::make_unique<kinematic_constraints::KinematicConstraintSet>((*ls)->getRobotModel());
138  kset->add(req.path_constraints, (*ls)->getTransforms());
139  constraint_fn = boost::bind(
140  &isStateValid,
141  req.avoid_collisions ? static_cast<const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr&>(*ls).get() : nullptr,
142  kset->empty() ? nullptr : kset.get(), _1, _2, _3);
143  }
144  bool global_frame = !moveit::core::Transforms::sameFrame(link_name, req.header.frame_id);
145  ROS_INFO_NAMED(getName(),
146  "Attempting to follow %u waypoints for link '%s' using a step of %lf m "
147  "and jump threshold %lf (in %s reference frame)",
148  (unsigned int)waypoints.size(), link_name.c_str(), req.max_step, req.jump_threshold,
149  global_frame ? "global" : "link");
150  std::vector<moveit::core::RobotStatePtr> traj;
151  res.fraction = moveit::core::CartesianInterpolator::computeCartesianPath(
152  &start_state, jmg, traj, start_state.getLinkModel(link_name), waypoints, global_frame,
153  moveit::core::MaxEEFStep(req.max_step), moveit::core::JumpThreshold(req.jump_threshold), constraint_fn);
154  moveit::core::robotStateToRobotStateMsg(start_state, res.start_state);
155 
156  robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectory rt(context_->planning_scene_monitor_->getRobotModel(), req.group_name);
157  for (const moveit::core::RobotStatePtr& traj_state : traj)
158  rt.addSuffixWayPoint(traj_state, 0.0);
159 
160  // time trajectory
161  // \todo optionally compute timing to move the eef with constant speed
162  trajectory_processing::IterativeParabolicTimeParameterization time_param;
163  time_param.computeTimeStamps(rt, 1.0);
164 
165  rt.getRobotTrajectoryMsg(res.solution);
166  ROS_INFO_NAMED(getName(), "Computed Cartesian path with %u points (followed %lf%% of requested trajectory)",
167  (unsigned int)traj.size(), res.fraction * 100.0);
168  if (display_computed_paths_ && rt.getWayPointCount() > 0)
169  {
170  moveit_msgs::DisplayTrajectory disp;
171  disp.model_id = context_->planning_scene_monitor_->getRobotModel()->getName();
172  disp.trajectory.resize(1, res.solution);
173  moveit::core::robotStateToRobotStateMsg(rt.getFirstWayPoint(), disp.trajectory_start);
174  display_path_.publish(disp);
175  }
176  }
177  res.error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::SUCCESS;
178  }
179  }
180  else
181  res.error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::FRAME_TRANSFORM_FAILURE;
182  }
183  else
184  res.error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_GROUP_NAME;
185 
186  return true;
187 }
188 
189 } // namespace move_group
